data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Vila Real, Portugal so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vila Real, Portugal
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Vila Real, Portugal.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Vila Real that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Vila Real unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Turk people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
There are 223,700 people living in the state of Vila Real. Only about 7,872 might be believers.
Spirit, train the church of Vila Real, Portugal to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Vila Real, Portugal, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
